Administration, financial management, HRM and planning
Health Management Information System (HMIS/DHIS2) and Supervision
1 Biannual Zonal Health Department Action Plan developed
2 Monthly service delivery reports of Hospitals and WHOs available in DHIS2, timely and completely
3 Biannual PBF Joint Review meetings organized
5 Quarterly PBF quality verifications of Hospitals done and reported timely in close collaboration with the purchaser
6 Quarterly Supportive Supervision Checklists administered at Hospitals
7 Annual Financial Audits conducted at Hospitals
1 Quarterly Woreda Health Office Action Plan developed
2 Monthly service delivery reports of HCs available in DHIS2, timely and completely
3 Percentage of households enrolled in CBHI and received their annual ID card (MEASURED ONCE PER YEAR)
4 Number of Health Facilities Supervised Using a Structured Quality Supervision and Assessment Tool
6 Number of Woreda Coordinating Meetings Held
7 Annual Financial Audits conducted at HCs
